item.title: events
item.description: future conferences 24th Internation Conference on Computational Statistics (August 23-26, 2022) DSSV 2022: Data Science Statistics and Visualisation (June 27-29, 2022) 51st Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June, 22-24, 2022) ECDA 2022: European Conference on Data Analysis (June 14-16, 2022) IES 2022: Innovation and Society 5.0: Statistical and Economic Models and Techniques for Quality Assessment (January 27-28, 2022) recent events CLADAG 2021: 13th Scientific Meeting Classification and Data Analysis Group (September 9-11, 2021) 63rd ISI World Statistics Congress 2021 (July 11-16, 2021) DSSV-ECDA 2021: Data Science Statistics and Visualisation and European Conference on Data Analysis (July 07-09, 2021) 50th Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 21-25, 2021)

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects seminars and talks events teaching material
